## Next.js

### Routing
- [Routing: App Router](https://nextjs.org/docs/app/building-your-application/routing)
- [Pages and Layouts](https://nextjs.org/docs/app/building-your-application/routing/pages-and-layouts)
- [Linking and Navigating](https://nextjs.org/docs/app/building-your-application/routing/linking-and-navigating)
- [Dynamic Routes](https://nextjs.org/docs/app/building-your-application/routing/dynamic-routes)
- [Intercepting Routes](https://nextjs.org/docs/app/building-your-application/routing/intercepting-routes)
- [Parallel and Intercepted Routes](https://nextjs.org/docs/app/building-your-application/routing/parallel-and-intercepted-routes)

### Rendering
- [Rendering Fundamentals](https://nextjs.org/docs/app/building-your-application/rendering)
- [Static Rendering](https://nextjs.org/docs/app/building-your-application/rendering/static)
- [Dynamic Rendering](https://nextjs.org/docs/app/building-your-application/rendering/dynamic)
- [Server Components](https://nextjs.org/docs/app/building-your-application/rendering/server-components)

### Data Fetching
- [Fetching Data](https://nextjs.org/docs/app/building-your-application/data-fetching/fetching)
- [Server Actions](https://nextjs.org/docs/app/building-your-application/data-fetching/server-actions)
- [Client Side Fetching](https://nextjs.org/docs/app/building-your-application/data-fetching/client-fetching)

### Metadata & SEO
- [Metadata API](https://nextjs.org/docs/app/building-your-application/optimizing/metadata)
- [Custom Metadata](https://nextjs.org/docs/app/api-reference/functions/generate-metadata)
- [Open Graph and SEO](https://nextjs.org/docs/app/building-your-application/optimizing/metadata#opengraph-image)

### Assets & Styling
- [Optimizing Fonts](https://nextjs.org/docs/app/building-your-application/optimizing/fonts)
- [Image Component](https://nextjs.org/docs/app/building-your-application/optimizing/images)
- [Styling with Tailwind CSS](https://nextjs.org/docs/app/building-your-application/styling/tailwind-css)

### API Routes & Middleware
- [API Routes (Pages Router)](https://nextjs.org/docs/pages/building-your-application/routing/api-routes)
- [Middleware](https://nextjs.org/docs/app/building-your-application/routing/middleware)

- [Dark Mode](https://ui.shadcn.com/docs/dark-mode)
- [Typography](https://ui.shadcn.com/docs/components/typography)

- [Alert Dialog](https://ui.shadcn.com/docs/components/alert-dialog)
- [Button](https://ui.shadcn.com/docs/components/button)
- [Card](https://ui.shadcn.com/docs/components/card)
- [Dialog](https://ui.shadcn.com/docs/components/dialog)
- [Dropdown Menu](https://ui.shadcn.com/docs/components/dropdown-menu)
- [Form](https://ui.shadcn.com/docs/components/form)
- [Input](https://ui.shadcn.com/docs/components/input)
- [Tabs](https://ui.shadcn.com/docs/components/tabs)
- [Toast](https://ui.shadcn.com/docs/components/toast)

- [Icons (lucide-react)](https://ui.shadcn.com/docs/components/icons)

## Supabase

### Introduction
- [What is Supabase?](https://supabase.com/docs)
- [Getting Started](https://supabase.com/docs/guides/with-nextjs)

### Database
- [Tables and Data](https://supabase.com/docs/guides/database)
- [SQL Editor](https://supabase.com/docs/guides/database/sql-editor)
- [Relationships & Foreign Keys](https://supabase.com/docs/guides/database/foreign-key-relationships)

### Auth
- [Auth Overview](https://supabase.com/docs/guides/auth)
- [Email/Password Login](https://supabase.com/docs/guides/auth/auth-email)
- [OAuth Providers](https://supabase.com/docs/guides/auth/social-login)
- [User Management](https://supabase.com/docs/guides/auth/managing-users)

### Realtime
- [Realtime Overview](https://supabase.com/docs/guides/realtime)
- [Listening to Changes](https://supabase.com/docs/guides/realtime/listen-to-postgres-changes)

### Storage
- [File Storage](https://supabase.com/docs/guides/storage)
- [Access Control](https://supabase.com/docs/guides/storage/access-control)

### API & Client Libraries
- [Supabase JavaScript Client](https://supabase.com/docs/reference/javascript/introduction)
- [Client from Next.js](https://supabase.com/docs/guides/with-nextjs)
- [Edge Functions](https://supabase.com/docs/guides/functions)

### Self-Hosting
- [Running Locally with Docker](https://supabase.com/docs/guides/self-hosting/docker)
- [Local Development Guide](https://supabase.com/docs/guides/self-hosting/overview)

---

## TypeScript Best Practices

### General
- [TypeScript Handbook](https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/intro.html)
- [Everyday TypeScript](https://www.totaltypescript.com/tutorials/beginners-typescript)
- [Effective TypeScript Tips](https://github.com/danvk/effective-typescript)
- [TypeScript Cheatsheets (React)](https://react-typescript-cheatsheet.netlify.app/)

### Patterns & Techniques
- [Avoid `any`, prefer `unknown`](https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/2/functions.html#unknown)
- [Use type narrowing](https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/2/narrowing.html)
- [Prefer type aliases (`type`) over interfaces for unions](https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/2/objects.html)
- [Safe typing for APIs and async data](https://kentcdodds.com/blog/using-typescript-with-async-functions)
- [Discriminated Unions](https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/2/narrowing.html#using-type-predicates)

### In React/Next.js
- [Typing Props and State](https://react-typescript-cheatsheet.netlify.app/docs/basic/getting-started/function_components/)
- [React Hook Form with TypeScript](https://react-hook-form.com/get-started#TypeScript)
- [Zod + TypeScript for runtime + static validation](https://zod.dev/)
- [Extending Tailwind config types](https://tailwindcss.com/docs/using-with-preprocessors#using-type-definitions)

## Mapbox
- [Uso de Mapbox GL JS en una Aplicación React](https://docs.mapbox.com/help/tutorials/use-mapbox-gl-js-with-react/)
- [react-map-gl: Integración de Mapbox GL JS en React](https://visgl.github.io/react-map-gl/)
- [Tutorial de Web Mapping con Mapbox y React.js](https://medium.com/@gisjohnecs/part-1-web-mapping-with-mapbox-gl-react-js-7d11b50d86ec)
- [Guía Rápida de Geocodificación en React con Mapbox](https://docs.mapbox.com/mapbox-search-js/guides/geocoding/react/)
- [Tutorial de Integración de Mapbox GL JS con React](https://blog.logrocket.com/using-mapbox-gl-js-react/)
